title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: Currently, the report design is storing the absolute path of the library include. It should be saving the relative path instead. For example, the current path is <property name="fileName"/>E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>, which is an absolute path. We need to modify it to <property name="fileName"/>../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property> so that it uses a relative path.
